Reviews.Title: Very sturdy cables
Reviews.Author: J Miller
Reviews.Content: I just purchased a house and I am installing a security system in my house.  I ordered this pair of cables, along with another set from Defender and this cable is much more sturdy feeling! Compared to the defender cables these feel more like cable for your TV.  I would recommend these to anyone looking! The cable actually states it's 56 FT in length.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed...
Reviews.Author: D. Wasinger
Reviews.Content: Purchased thru Digital Peripheral Solutions. Returned because of a bad video bnc connector. The replacement cable I received should have been a new replacement but appeared to be used. There were scuff marks on the connectors and the packaging was shabby. The video connectors are ok but not the quality of the 100 ft cables from Q-See. I will just eat this one because another shipping charge to send it back means I would have paid twice as much for the cable.

Reviews.Title: Great shielded RG-59 coax 18/2 siamese cables.
Reviews.Author: David Johnson
Reviews.Content: Theses are shielded RG-59 coax with 2C #18 power cable. They are siamese cables. Great for running camera signal and power without interference.

Reviews.Title: Quality and seems durable.  Well built.
Reviews.Author: MaryL
Reviews.Content: I am trying to think of something to say other than it a quality QSVRG60 Q-See Shielded cable as expected.  It is actually better than the cables included in our original setup.  Feels more durable, more rugged when pullind through attic to connect to the camera.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed twice
Reviews.Author: Ralph W. Powell
Reviews.Content: Actually, I LIKE THE PRODUCT THAT IS SHOWN (I purchased some about a year ago), but it is NOT WHAT I RECEIVED. What I received was BLACK RG59 cable - and it did not appear to be shielded - which is what I needed for in-wall installation. Amazon shipped another package right away as a replacement - but it was exactly the same as the first.  I decided to try it anyway. It worked when I hooked it up to test it. But when I installed it in the wall going to the attic, the cable would not work.I believe the fault may have been that the manufacturer (Q-See) mislabeled the product they shipped to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Ordered this wire, recieved a black, Unshielded wire twice
Reviews.Author: Bill Jaffe
Reviews.Content: The box says White/Shielded and the sticker on the actual wire says Color: WHITE.......yet the wire is black and is unshielded. I returned the wire and Amazon sent a replacement. Again I get a Black unshielded wire(both of which didn't work btw)

Reviews.Title: Buy shielded, dont cheap out for crappy quality to save 10 bucks!
Reviews.Author: AC Florida
Reviews.Content: If you care at all about video quality, you will use SHIELDED video cable for long CCTV runs going through your attic right next to a bunch of power lines. Amazing the #1 selling CCTV cable is non-shielded. Spend a little more and get this.Fast shipping, product as advertised. Perfect transaction, thanks!
